Uses of Package
com.moglan.eac.model.connection

  • Packages that use com.moglan.eac.model.connection 
    Package Description
    com.moglan.eac.application  
    com.moglan.eac.model.connection  
  • Classes in com.moglan.eac.model.connection used by com.moglan.eac.application 
    Class and Description
    MeasuringDevice
    Simulates a measuring device that constantly sends data to a server.
  • Classes in com.moglan.eac.model.connection used by com.moglan.eac.model.connection 
    Class and Description
    Message
    The unit of exchange between a client and the server.
    Monitor
    Monitors multiple clients and counts the total number of messages received.
    Protocol
    Establishes the different types of messages that can be exchanged between the client and the server.
    TCPClient
    A TCP client that uses a handshake protocol for exchanging data with a server and ending its connection with it.
    TCPServer
    A TCP server capable of handling requests from multiple clients at the same time.
    TCPServerTask
    Allows launching the server operations on a separate thread so that they can be stopped asynchronously from the main thread.
